properties.description:
Created by olseir, 24.06.2020
Not included in any pipeline

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		accounting_year_start_DAte as date,
		accounting_year_end_Date as date,
		accounting_year_number as long,
		accounting_year_key as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select accounting_year_start_date, accounting_year_end_Date, accounting_year_number, ACCOUNTING_YEAR_TIME_SPAN accounting_year_key  from dwh_stage.sta_dim_time',
	format: 'query') ~> DimTime
DimTime aggregate(groupBy(accounting_year_key,
		accounting_year_start_DAte,
		accounting_year_end_Date,
		accounting_year_number),
	each(match(name!='key'), $$ = first($$))) ~> RemoveDuplicates
RemoveDuplicates derive(dimension_key = RemoveDuplicates@accounting_year_key) ~> AddDimensionKey
AddDimensionKey sink(input(
		dimension_key as long,
		year_time_span as integer,
		year_number_key as string,
		year_start_date as date,
		year_number as integer,
		year_end_date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		dimension_key = RemoveDuplicates@accounting_year_key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimTimeAccYear
